engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: There's been more murders? And they occurred here at the harbor? Goodness me.
engSearchText:
There's been more murders? And they occurred here
at the harbor? Goodness me.
jpnChrName: よもや港で殺人事件が起きるとはな…… 聞けば昨晩も霧の中で殺人があったとか。
jpnSearchText:
よもや港で殺人事件が起きるとはな……
聞けば昨晩も霧の中で殺人があったとか。

engChrName: Well, I suppose it's time for us to go into crisis management mode. These terrorist attacks don't appear to be slowing down.
engSearchText:
Well, I suppose it's time for us to go into crisis
management mode. These terrorist attacks don't
appear to be slowing down.
jpnChrName: 最近ではテロも減ったし油断していたが、 我々貿易会社も危機管理はした方が良いかね。
jpnSearchText:
最近ではテロも減ったし油断していたが、
我々貿易会社も危機管理はした方が良いかね。

engChrName: A brawl in the harbor and murder in the Eastern Quarter... What is this world coming to?
engSearchText:
A brawl in the harbor and murder in the
Eastern Quarter... What is this world coming to?
jpnChrName: 昨日は乱闘騒ぎばかりか、東方人街で殺しも…… 今日の便に影響無いのは幸いだが……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は乱闘騒ぎばかりか、東方人街で殺しも……
今日の便に影響無いのは幸いだが……

engChrName: Fortunately, this has had no effect on the business. Trade and commerce with the Central East have been going smoothly.
engSearchText:
Fortunately, this has had no effect on the business.
Trade and commerce with the Central East have
been going smoothly.
jpnChrName: 最近では中東方面との海運も 一層盛んになりつつあるしな。
jpnSearchText:
最近では中東方面との海運も
一層盛んになりつつあるしな。

engChrName: We have to keep this well-oiled machine running.
engSearchText: We have to keep this well-oiled machine running.
jpnChrName: 我々貿易商は、とにかく物流が 止まらないよう走り続けるだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
我々貿易商は、とにかく物流が
止まらないよう走り続けるだけだ。

engChrName: There's been even more murders? I can't believe it...
engSearchText: There's been even more murders? I can't believe it...
jpnChrName: 二度も死人の出る事件があるとはな……
jpnSearchText: 二度も死人の出る事件があるとはな……

engChrName: I feel for the victims. If I find out that Heiyue was involved in any capacity, then I'm gonna bust down their door.
engSearchText:
I feel for the victims. If I find out that Heiyue was
involved in any capacity, then I'm gonna bust down
their door.
jpnChrName: 犠牲者には同情するが、黒月が何かしら 関与しているというのならば話は別だ。
jpnSearchText:
犠牲者には同情するが、黒月が何かしら
関与しているというのならば話は別だ。

engChrName: Those murders never would've happened if Heiyue was out of the picture. They attract criminals like flies to manure.
engSearchText:
Those murders never would've happened if Heiyue
was out of the picture. They attract criminals like flies
to manure.
jpnChrName: こういう事件も……かのシンジケートが この街に呼び寄せている面もあるんじゃないかね？
jpnSearchText:
こういう事件も……かのシンジケートが
この街に呼び寄せている面もあるんじゃないかね？

engChrName: I heard some people got killed on Heiyue's turf last night—but no one's talking about that.
engSearchText:
I heard some people got killed on Heiyue's turf last
night—but no one's talking about that.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は黒月の縄張りで殺人事件があったと 聞くが……大きな混乱がある訳でもなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は黒月の縄張りで殺人事件があったと
聞くが……大きな混乱がある訳でもなさそうだな。

engChrName: Whether that happened or not, though, I've gotta continue monitoring them.
engSearchText:
Whether that happened or not, though, I've gotta
continue monitoring them.
jpnChrName: まあ、どの道私のやる事に変わりはない。 連中が貿易業に関与し続ける限りは……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、どの道私のやる事に変わりはない。
連中が貿易業に関与し続ける限りは……

engChrName: Smuggling takes many forms, but I'm pretty sure Heiyue doesn't do it the conventional way.
engSearchText:
Smuggling takes many forms, but I'm pretty sure
Heiyue doesn't do it the conventional way.
jpnChrName: 密輸にも色々と形態はあるが…… 黒月はそれを巧みに使い分ける。
jpnSearchText:
密輸にも色々と形態はあるが……
黒月はそれを巧みに使い分ける。

engChrName: Most do it at night, but as far as I know, Heiyue doesn't. Makes me think they've got other means of getting the job done.
engSearchText:
Most do it at night, but as far as I know,
Heiyue doesn't. Makes me think they've got other
means of getting the job done.
jpnChrName: 闇夜に紛れてというのは定番ではあるが…… 連中はそんな単純な手は使わんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
闇夜に紛れてというのは定番ではあるが……
連中はそんな単純な手は使わんだろう。

engChrName: One of these days, though, I'll catch them in the act.
engSearchText: One of these days, though, I'll catch them in the act.
jpnChrName: だが……連中の下請けが迂闊に夜に 尻尾を出す可能性はあるからな。
jpnSearchText:
だが……連中の下請けが迂闊に夜に
尻尾を出す可能性はあるからな。

engChrName: I bet one of their subcontractors will do it around this time someday, and when they do, I'll be on them in a flash.
engSearchText:
I bet one of their subcontractors will do it around this
time someday, and when they do, I'll be on them in
a flash.
jpnChrName: 少しの証拠でも見逃さないため、 監視を強化しているのだ。
jpnSearchText:
少しの証拠でも見逃さないため、
監視を強化しているのだ。

engChrName: I heard about the murders at the storehouse. There was a similar terrorist attack in a harbor located in the northern part of the Republic.
engSearchText:
I heard about the murders at the storehouse.
There was a similar terrorist attack in a harbor located
in the northern part of the Republic.
jpnChrName: 倉庫街の方で事件か…… そういえば、共和国北部の港でもテロがあったとか。
jpnSearchText:
倉庫街の方で事件か……
そういえば、共和国北部の港でもテロがあったとか。

engChrName: Seeing two of Calvard's harbor cities come under fire is definitely nerve-racking.
engSearchText:
Seeing two of Calvard's harbor cities come under fire
is definitely nerve-racking.
jpnChrName: この国の二大港湾都市で問題があるとなれば、 我々としても今後の影響は考慮せねばな。
jpnSearchText:
この国の二大港湾都市で問題があるとなれば、
我々としても今後の影響は考慮せねばな。

engChrName: More and more trading companies are turning to that private military company for protection.
engSearchText:
More and more trading companies are turning to that
private military company for protection.
jpnChrName: 最近では、民間警備会社に守ってもらう 貿易会社も増えつつあると聞くが……
jpnSearchText:
最近では、民間警備会社に守ってもらう
貿易会社も増えつつあると聞くが……

engChrName: I don't really blame them, but knowing who their primary investor is, I can't help but feel wary...
engSearchText:
I don't really blame them, but knowing who their
primary investor is, I can't help but feel wary...
jpnChrName: あの会社の出資者は……それを考えると どうにも割り切れんな。
jpnSearchText:
あの会社の出資者は……それを考えると
どうにも割り切れんな。

engChrName: I arrived here this morning only to learn that there were some gruesome murders last night.
engSearchText:
I arrived here this morning only to learn that there
were some gruesome murders last night.
jpnChrName: 私は今朝方到着したのだが、 聞けば昨晩何か騒ぎがあったとか。
jpnSearchText:
私は今朝方到着したのだが、
聞けば昨晩何か騒ぎがあったとか。

engChrName: We're willing to provide whatever aid the people need.
engSearchText:
We're willing to provide whatever aid the
people need.
jpnChrName: 大事に至っていないなら幸いだが、 もしもの事があれば我々も支援をしよう。
jpnSearchText:
大事に至っていないなら幸いだが、
もしもの事があれば我々も支援をしよう。

engChrName: If there's chaos in the Republic's major harbors, it'll definitely have a trickle down effect on Elsaim.
engSearchText:
If there's chaos in the Republic's major harbors, it'll
definitely have a trickle down effect on Elsaim.
jpnChrName: 共和国随一の港湾都市で混乱があれば、 我がエルザイム公国にも影響する可能性もあるしな。
jpnSearchText:
共和国随一の港湾都市で混乱があれば、
我がエルザイム公国にも影響する可能性もあるしな。

engChrName: After what happened at the storehouse, I want to strengthen security even further.
engSearchText:
After what happened at the storehouse, I want to
strengthen security even further.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: 倉庫の方で事件があったようだな…… 海軍としても港の警備を強化する見込みだ。
jpnSearchText:
倉庫の方で事件があったようだな……
海軍としても港の警備を強化する見込みだ。

engChrName: Thankfully, the people above me agree. They seem adamant about working with the police now.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, the people above me agree. They seem
adamant about working with the police now.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: 港を守るのも海軍の使命だ、上の方も何とか 警察と連携できる体制を作りたいらしい。
jpnSearchText:
港を守るのも海軍の使命だ、上の方も何とか
警察と連携できる体制を作りたいらしい。

engChrName: We upped our security after we heard about what happened in the Eastern Quarter. Better safe than sorry.
engSearchText:
We upped our security after we heard about what
happened in the Eastern Quarter. Better safe
than sorry.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: 昨夜の霧については、今の所は港には 影響は出ていないが、念のために警戒を強めている。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜の霧については、今の所は港には
影響は出ていないが、念のために警戒を強めている。

engChrName: Its our job to protect the harbor and the ships—as well as the sea lane.
engSearchText:
Its our job to protect the harbor and the ships—as
well as the sea lane.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: 我々も海路（シーレーン）を守ってきた誇りがある。 港と船の安全に関わる以上は無視はできないのでな。
jpnSearchText:
我々も海路（シーレーン）を守ってきた誇りがある。
港と船の安全に関わる以上は無視はできないのでな。

engChrName: Sadly, some of the naval officers are negligent in that regard. They even deal in the black market sometimes...
engSearchText:
Sadly, some of the naval officers are negligent in
that regard. They even deal in the black
market sometimes...
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: しかし……我々の中にも、不正や横流しをする 軍人もいるようだから恥ずかしい限りだ……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……我々の中にも、不正や横流しをする
軍人もいるようだから恥ずかしい限りだ……

engChrName: Up ahead is the naval port for the Republican Navy and the South Sea Armada. Entry beyond this point is strictly prohibited.
engSearchText:
Up ahead is the naval port for the Republican Navy
and the South Sea Armada. Entry beyond this point
is strictly prohibited.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: この先は共和国海軍・南海艦隊の軍港だ、 許可証無しでの立ち入りは禁じられている。
jpnSearchText:
この先は共和国海軍・南海艦隊の軍港だ、
許可証無しでの立ち入りは禁じられている。

engChrName: A year and a half ago, our navy could go toe to toe with the Empire's. Calvard invests more into their air fleet these days, though.
engSearchText:
A year and a half ago, our navy could go toe to toe
with the Empire's. Calvard invests more into their air
fleet these days, though.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: 飛行艦隊の活躍に隠れがちだが、一年半前にも 海軍は帝国相手に互角以上に戦い抜いたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
飛行艦隊の活躍に隠れがちだが、一年半前にも
海軍は帝国相手に互角以上に戦い抜いたんだ。

engChrName: But our ships are still pretty impressive. You should check them out during the next naval review at the Revolution Festival.
engSearchText:
But our ships are still pretty impressive. You should
check them out during the next naval review at the
Revolution Festival.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: その雄姿を見ようとやって来る者も多いが…… 生憎、観艦式は革命記念祭まで予定が無いのでな。
jpnSearchText:
その雄姿を見ようとやって来る者も多いが……
生憎、観艦式は革命記念祭まで予定が無いのでな。

engChrName: Our navy is supposed to get a slew of new equipment soon. There might be some new weapons among them.
engSearchText:
Our navy is supposed to get a slew of new
equipment soon. There might be some new weapons
among them.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: 我が海軍も近いうちに装備を刷新する予定でな。 画期的な新兵装も、ある程度は回って来るとか。
jpnSearchText:
我が海軍も近いうちに装備を刷新する予定でな。
画期的な新兵装も、ある程度は回って来るとか。

engChrName: We'll definitely use this opportunity to modernize the navy. We have to make our president proud.
engSearchText:
We'll definitely use this opportunity to modernize
the navy. We have to make our president proud.
engHtmlText: エイブラムス海軍曹長
jpnChrName: それを機に海軍も艦隊の更なる近代化ができれば、 大統領閣下のご期待にも沿えるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
それを機に海軍も艦隊の更なる近代化ができれば、
大統領閣下のご期待にも沿えるだろう。

engChrName: I heard there was a mafia-related incident at the storehouse. Not that it matters to me.
engSearchText:
I heard there was a mafia-related incident at
the storehouse. Not that it matters to me.
jpnChrName: 倉庫でマフィア絡みの事件があったのか…… まあ、別にそれ自体は知った事じゃねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
倉庫でマフィア絡みの事件があったのか……
まあ、別にそれ自体は知った事じゃねぇが……

engChrName: It's been a pretty big nuisance, though. Hard to do much of anything with all these cops and bracers buzzing about.
engSearchText:
It's been a pretty big nuisance, though. Hard to do
much of anything with all these cops and bracers
buzzing about.
jpnChrName: 警察や遊撃士の連中が港に居座ってると 動きにくいったらありゃしねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
警察や遊撃士の連中が港に居座ってると
動きにくいったらありゃしねぇな。

engChrName: But all storms pass with time.
engSearchText: But all storms pass with time.
jpnChrName: まあ……それも時間が解決するだろうけどな。
jpnSearchText: まあ……それも時間が解決するだろうけどな。

engChrName: I have no clue what happened in the Eastern Quarter last night.
engSearchText:
I have no clue what happened in the Eastern Quarter
last night.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は東方人街の方が妙な感じに なっていたが……ありゃあ何なんだ？
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は東方人街の方が妙な感じに
なっていたが……ありゃあ何なんだ？

engChrName: All I know is that it's drawn the cops' and navy's attention away from here.
engSearchText:
All I know is that it's drawn the cops' and navy's
attention away from here.
jpnChrName: まあ、警察やら海軍の注意があちこちに バラけるのは好都合ではあるな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、警察やら海軍の注意があちこちに
バラけるのは好都合ではあるな。

engChrName: It's time to strike while the iron's hot. We don't normally do our 'trade' business in the day, but we can't pass this opportunity up.
engSearchText:
It's time to strike while the iron's hot. We don't
normally do our 'trade' business in the day, but we
can't pass this opportunity up.
jpnChrName: ちと早めにはなるが、今のうちに 不都合な事は諸々揉み消しておくか……
jpnSearchText:
ちと早めにはなるが、今のうちに
不都合な事は諸々揉み消しておくか……

engChrName: Okay, that should be the last of today's goods. Let's load these up on the double.
engSearchText:
Okay, that should be the last of today's goods.
Let's load these up on the double.
jpnChrName: ふん、今日の品はさっきので全部だ。 今のうちに積み込んでおけよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、今日の品はさっきので全部だ。
今のうちに積み込んでおけよ。

engChrName: The cops and the guild are busy dealing with the mafia, so now's the time to make some dough.
engSearchText:
The cops and the guild are busy dealing with the
mafia, so now's the time to make some dough.
jpnChrName: 今なら、警察やギルドも マフィアで手一杯のはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
今なら、警察やギルドも
マフィアで手一杯のはずだ。

engChrName: As long as we're careful, we'll make out like a bandit, and my coworkers will be none the wiser.
engSearchText:
As long as we're careful, we'll make out like a bandit,
and my coworkers will be none the wiser.
jpnChrName: うちの海軍も頭硬いのが多いしな。 ヘマしない限り気づきやしねぇだろうさ。
jpnSearchText:
うちの海軍も頭硬いのが多いしな。
ヘマしない限り気づきやしねぇだろうさ。

engChrName: (These two are up to no good. Guess a harbor city like Langport's bound to attract guys like them.)
engSearchText:
(These two are up to no good. Guess a harbor city
like Langport's bound to attract guys like them.)
jpnChrName: （こいつらは……ハッ、これも巨大港湾都市の   一つの顔ってところなんだろうが。）
jpnSearchText:
（こいつらは……ハッ、これも巨大港湾都市の
一つの顔ってところなんだろうが。）

engChrName: (Yeah. Heiyue doesn't have as firm a grip over the harbor, but you still have to have a lot of guts to attempt something like this.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. Heiyue doesn't have as firm a grip over the
harbor, but you still have to have a lot of guts to
attempt something like this.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、この辺りは黒月の目も   万全じゃねえとはいえ、大した度胸だぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、この辺りは黒月の目も
万全じゃねえとはいえ、大した度胸だぜ。）

engChrName: Productivity's been down recently, but we can make up for it now. The mafia's basically doing us a favor here.
engSearchText:
Productivity's been down recently, but we can make
up for it now. The mafia's basically doing us a
favor here.
jpnChrName: ふん、最近は色々とやりにくい事もあったが、 混乱があるなら好都合というものだ……
jpnSearchText:
ふん、最近は色々とやりにくい事もあったが、
混乱があるなら好都合というものだ……

engChrName: The murders just keep happening...
engSearchText: The murders just keep happening...
jpnChrName: また死人まで出ちまうとはよ……
jpnSearchText: また死人まで出ちまうとはよ……

engChrName: The antique sellers are all terrified, and I'm right there with them.
engSearchText:
The antique sellers are all terrified, and I'm right
there with them.
jpnChrName: オイラには関係無いとは思いてェが…… 古物屋が妙に怯えてんのが気掛かりで仕方ねェ。
jpnSearchText:
オイラには関係無いとは思いてェが……
古物屋が妙に怯えてんのが気掛かりで仕方ねェ。

engChrName: I'm not sure if the mafia's responsible for all this, but if they are, I REALLY hope someone clears 'em out...
engSearchText:
I'm not sure if the mafia's responsible for all this, but
if they are, I REALLY hope someone clears
'em out...
jpnChrName: 北のマフィアも何してたのか分からねェし…… つくづく不気味なもんだなァ……
jpnSearchText:
北のマフィアも何してたのか分からねェし……
つくづく不気味なもんだなァ……

engChrName: I heard people in the Eastern Quarter were murdered in cold blood... Gah! A chill just ran down my spine!
engSearchText:
I heard people in the Eastern Quarter were murdered
in cold blood... Gah! A chill just ran down my spine!
jpnChrName: 昨日は東方人街じゃあの霧ン中で殺しまで あったっていうが……不気味で仕方ねェ！
jpnSearchText:
昨日は東方人街じゃあの霧ン中で殺しまで
あったっていうが……不気味で仕方ねェ！

engChrName: I wonder if the mafia was behind the attack?
engSearchText: I wonder if the mafia was behind the attack?
jpnChrName: 例の最近来たっつうマフィアと、何か関係でも ありやがるってんのかァ……？
jpnSearchText:
例の最近来たっつうマフィアと、何か関係でも
ありやがるってんのかァ……？

engChrName: S-Surely they wouldn't pick a fight with the navy, right? Hopefully Glasley will protect me...
engSearchText:
S-Surely they wouldn't pick a fight with the
navy, right? Hopefully Glasley will protect me...
jpnChrName: さ、流石に連中も軍にケンカは売らねぇだろうし、 グラスレーの旦那が付いてるオイラは大丈夫と信じてェが……
jpnSearchText:
さ、流石に連中も軍にケンカは売らねぇだろうし、
グラスレーの旦那が付いてるオイラは大丈夫と信じてェが……

engChrName: I was freakin' out when that fight broke out this afternoon.
engSearchText:
I was freakin' out when that fight broke out
this afternoon.

jpnSearchText:
昼間はあっちの古物屋が喧嘩に巻き込まれて、
オイラもどうなるかと焦りやしたが……

engChrName: But you were as cool as a cucumber, Glasley.
engSearchText: But you were as cool as a cucumber, Glasley.
jpnChrName: 流石はグラスレーの旦那ですぜ、 肝が据わってらっしゃる。
jpnSearchText:
流石はグラスレーの旦那ですぜ、
肝が据わってらっしゃる。

engChrName: I feel so much safer with you around.
engSearchText: I feel so much safer with you around.
jpnChrName: あんたとなら、品を流す手伝いも 長くやってけそうですぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたとなら、品を流す手伝いも
長くやってけそうですぜ。

engChrName: Wait, what? Some of those gangsters were killed?
engSearchText: Wait, what? Some of those gangsters were killed?
jpnChrName: 半グレ共まで殺されちまったのか……
jpnSearchText: 半グレ共まで殺されちまったのか……

engChrName: Why is this the first time I'm hearing of this?
engSearchText: Why is this the first time I'm hearing of this?
jpnChrName: こんなに死人が出るなんて聞いてねぇよ……
jpnSearchText: こんなに死人が出るなんて聞いてねぇよ……

engChrName: What the hell have I gotten myself into?
engSearchText: What the hell have I gotten myself into?
jpnChrName: マジで俺、とんでもねぇ事に 関わっちまったんじゃねぇか……
jpnSearchText:
マジで俺、とんでもねぇ事に
関わっちまったんじゃねぇか……

engChrName: Damn it. I don't know what I'm gonna do. I can't exactly go crawling to Heiyue for help...
engSearchText:
Damn it. I don't know what I'm gonna do. I can't
exactly go crawling to Heiyue for help...
jpnChrName: 畜生、どうすりゃいいんだよ…… 今更黒月にも頼れねぇしよぉ……
jpnSearchText:
畜生、どうすりゃいいんだよ……
今更黒月にも頼れねぇしよぉ……

engChrName: I heard those gangsters were involved in the Eastern Quarter murders.
engSearchText:
I heard those gangsters were involved in the Eastern
Quarter murders.
jpnChrName: 東方人街であったっていう殺しだが…… 例の半グレ共が絡んでいたって……？
jpnSearchText:
東方人街であったっていう殺しだが……
例の半グレ共が絡んでいたって……？

engChrName: To think those guys would go that far...
engSearchText: To think those guys would go that far...
jpnChrName: おいおい、洒落にならねぇっていうか…… まさか俺に絡んだ連中がそこまでやるとは……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、洒落にならねぇっていうか……
まさか俺に絡んだ連中がそこまでやるとは……

engChrName: This thing's turning into a hot mess.
engSearchText: This thing's turning into a hot mess.
jpnChrName: ……まさか、予想以上の大事に 巻き込まれちまっているんじゃ……？
jpnSearchText:
……まさか、予想以上の大事に
巻き込まれちまっているんじゃ……？

engChrName: Guess those gangsters aren't gonna drop in tonight, either. Those guys can be a real pain in the neck.
engSearchText:
Guess those gangsters aren't gonna drop in
tonight, either. Those guys can be a real pain in
the neck.
jpnChrName: 今夜は流石に半グレ共も来ねぇか…… まったく、あの連中には参ったもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
今夜は流石に半グレ共も来ねぇか……
まったく、あの連中には参ったもんだよ。

engChrName: I hear they've been stirring up trouble for people. They really are just a bunch of rude little shits.
engSearchText:
I hear they've been stirring up trouble for people.
They really are just a bunch of rude little shits.
jpnChrName: あちこちを荒らしてるって言うし、俺みたいな 奴から見ても……ろくでもない連中だ。
jpnSearchText:
あちこちを荒らしてるって言うし、俺みたいな
奴から見ても……ろくでもない連中だ。

engChrName: I can't imagine what kids like them would want with something so old.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine what kids like them would want with
something so old.
jpnChrName: しかし……何であんなハジけた連中が、 あの古ぼけた品を欲しがるんだろうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……何であんなハジけた連中が、
あの古ぼけた品を欲しがるんだろうなぁ……

engChrName: We just finished inspecting the scene, and all the bodies have been collected as well...
engSearchText:
We just finished inspecting the scene, and all the
bodies have been collected as well...
jpnChrName: ようやく現場検証が終わった所よ。 ……遺体も回収したけど、あれは……
jpnSearchText:
ようやく現場検証が終わった所よ。
……遺体も回収したけど、あれは……

engChrName: Hey, Aaron. I'm sure you don't need me to tell you this, but Almata's leaders are bad news.
engSearchText:
Hey, Aaron. I'm sure you don't need me to tell you
this, but Almata's leaders are bad news.
jpnChrName: アーロン、お前ももう判っているはず。 アルマータの幹部がどれだけ危険か。
jpnSearchText:
アーロン、お前ももう判っているはず。
アルマータの幹部がどれだけ危険か。

engChrName: I'm almost certain one of them is former military. You're not on their level yet, so I want you to—
engSearchText:
I'm almost certain one of them is former military.
You're not on their level yet, so I want you to—
jpnChrName: 一人は恐らく軍人上がり── “素人”のお前とはワケが違うよ。
jpnSearchText:
一人は恐らく軍人上がり──
“素人”のお前とはワケが違うよ。

engChrName: You better not be telling me to stay away from them—because I won't hear it!
engSearchText:
You better not be telling me to stay away from
them—because I won't hear it!
jpnChrName: ハッ……ンな事は百も承知だっつの。 イチイチ絡んでくるんじゃねえよ！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……ンな事は百も承知だっつの。
イチイチ絡んでくるんじゃねえよ！

engChrName: I know they're stronger than me, but those bastards are tearing up my town... And they murdered my friends in cold blood...
engSearchText:
I know they're stronger than me, but those bastards
are tearing up my town... And they murdered my
friends in cold blood...
jpnChrName: だがな、街を好き放題荒らされて、 仲間もあんな風にされて……
jpnSearchText:
だがな、街を好き放題荒らされて、
仲間もあんな風にされて……

engChrName: So don't you DARE tell me what to do. You don't understand jack shit about what I'm going through!
engSearchText:
So don't you DARE tell me what to do. You don't
understand jack shit about what I'm going through!
jpnChrName: ハッ、高尚な遊撃士サマに 何が分かるってんだ、アア！？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、高尚な遊撃士サマに
何が分かるってんだ、アア！？

engChrName: Excuse me?! You think I don't understand?!
engSearchText: Excuse me?! You think I don't understand?!
jpnChrName: フン、わかるに決まってるね……！
jpnSearchText: フン、わかるに決まってるね……！

engChrName: Well, guess what? I do. You're not the only one who's pissed off, you know!
engSearchText:
Well, guess what? I do. You're not the only one who's
pissed off, you know!
jpnChrName: あたしだってハラワタ煮えるほどね！！
jpnSearchText: あたしだってハラワタ煮えるほどね！！

engChrName: I wasn't trying to tell you to stay away from them, I was going to tell you to be careful.
engSearchText:
I wasn't trying to tell you to stay away from them, I
was going to tell you to be careful.
jpnChrName: でもねアーロン、許せないからこそ 今は慎重に、確実に動くべきね。
jpnSearchText:
でもねアーロン、許せないからこそ
今は慎重に、確実に動くべきね。

engChrName: If you throw caution to the wind, you'll be playing right into their hands. Who would get justice for your friends if that happened?
engSearchText:
If you throw caution to the wind, you'll be playing
right into their hands. Who would get justice for your
friends if that happened?
jpnChrName: それが本当の手向けに繋がる── お前ももう判っているハズよ。
jpnSearchText:
それが本当の手向けに繋がる──
お前ももう判っているハズよ。

engChrName: She's got you there.
engSearchText: She's got you there.
jpnChrName: ……別にお前が間違ってるワケじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: ……別にお前が間違ってるワケじゃねえ。

engChrName: I understand how you feel, but it can't hurt to keep her advice in mind.
engSearchText:
I understand how you feel, but it can't hurt to keep
her advice in mind.
jpnChrName: ただちっとは年上の言葉、 気に留めておいて損は無いぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ただちっとは年上の言葉、
気に留めておいて損は無いぜ。

engChrName: ...Fine.
engSearchText: ...Fine.
jpnChrName: ……チッ、わーったよ。
jpnSearchText: ……チッ、わーったよ。

engChrName: But it doesn't change what I have to do.
engSearchText: But it doesn't change what I have to do.
jpnChrName: せいぜい覚えておいてはやるが…… オレのやる事は変わらねぇからな。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい覚えておいてはやるが……
オレのやる事は変わらねぇからな。

engChrName: Thanks to Calvin and Hornet, the police and the bracers are working together.
engSearchText:
Thanks to Calvin and Hornet, the police and the
bracers are working together.
jpnChrName: カルビンやホーネットのお陰で警察とも ある程度、互いの方針が擦り合わせられたね。
jpnSearchText:
カルビンやホーネットのお陰で警察とも
ある程度、互いの方針が擦り合わせられたね。

engChrName: The cops are handling the arrests and are searching for Almata's whereabouts.
engSearchText:
The cops are handling the arrests and are searching
for Almata's whereabouts.

jpnSearchText:
やはり警察はマフィアの検挙とルートの
洗い出しが最優先になるみたい。

engSearchText:
We'll handle things from here, spriggan. You go kick
butt out there—and try to keep Aaron out of harm's
way, all right?

jpnSearchText:
そして裏解決屋……言えた義理じゃないけど、
その同門の跳ね返りをよろしくね……！

engSearchText:
You're free to investigate the storehouse as long as
you're quick about it.

jpnSearchText:
君達については私の方でも把握している。
短時間であれば倉庫内の捜索を許可しよう。

engChrName: We have authority over the crime scene—at least for the time being.
engSearchText:
We have authority over the crime scene—at least for
the time being.

jpnSearchText:
今回は黒月よりも先に現場を抑え、一応の
折り合いは付けてこの場を預かっているのでな。

engChrName: Presently, we're trying to track down the Almata executives. If you learn anything, I'd be happy to exchange information.
engSearchText:
Presently, we're trying to track down the
Almata executives. If you learn anything, I'd be happy
to exchange information.

jpnSearchText:
逃走したアルマータ幹部の行方も捜査を始めた。
君達も情報を得たら我々に提供して欲しい。

engSearchText:
We're looking into the transportation network as well
as any suspicious companies that may have ties to
the mafia.

jpnSearchText:
現状、警察では改めて交通網や疑わしい会社を
洗い出しマフィア幹部を捕捉する方針だ。

In doing so, however, the force has been spread
too thin. That's why we're working in tandem with
the guild.

jpnSearchText:
だが、そうなるとやはり人手を割く事になる……
市内での混乱対応はギルドと協力する形になるな。

Our efforts align with their goal to protect the
citizens, so they're happy to work with us.

ギルド側も、民間人の安全保護を
優先する以上、異存はないとの事だ。

engSearchText: September 20th, 4:30PM

engSearchText: Whoa! Look at all these boats!

jpnSearchText:
わあっ……！
船が泊まっていますね！

Judging by their makes, I imagine this is a privately
owned pier.

jpnSearchText:
ヨットにクルーザー……

このあたりでしょうか？
“古い装置”の噂があった露店は。

Probably. There's a big ol' naval wharf on the east
side of town.

ああ、ラングポートの東には
デカイ埠頭や軍港もあるが……

engSearchText:
Rather than hang out there, shady folks tend to end
up in places like this.

jpnSearchText:
こっちは人通りが少ない分、
怪しげな連中も集まりやすい。

engChrName: Sometimes you'll even find folks peddlin' black market goods sourced straight from the navy.

Sometimes you'll even find folks peddlin' black
market goods sourced straight from the navy.

海軍からの横流し品やらを
扱ってるヤツなんかもいたはずだ。

engChrName: I-I see...
engSearchText: I-I see...
jpnChrName: な、なるほど……
jpnSearchText: な、なるほど……

engChrName: If that kind of trading is possible here, I wonder if Heiyue has less oversight here as well.
engSearchText:
If that kind of trading is possible here, I wonder if
Heiyue has less oversight here as well.
jpnChrName: ──でも、その意味では 黒月の干渉も少ない訳ですか。
jpnSearchText:
──でも、その意味では
黒月の干渉も少ない訳ですか。

engChrName: Maybe that means we'll find what we're looking for!
engSearchText: Maybe that means we'll find what we're looking for!
jpnChrName: “お宝”がある可能性も 高いってことですねっ……！
jpnSearchText:
“お宝”がある可能性も
高いってことですねっ……！

engChrName: Only one way to find out. I've got a hunch where the stall might be.
engSearchText:
Only one way to find out. I've got a hunch where
the stall might be.
jpnChrName: そいつは分からんが その露店については見当が付く。
jpnSearchText:
そいつは分からんが
その露店については見当が付く。

engChrName: We should go straight there—sun's gonna go down soon.
engSearchText:
We should go straight there—sun's gonna go
down soon.
jpnChrName: そろそろ夕方だ── 寄り道せずに確かめるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そろそろ夕方だ──
寄り道せずに確かめるぞ。

engChrName: Come on down! I've got great stuff for great prices!
engSearchText: Come on down! I've got great stuff for great prices!
jpnChrName: 寄ってらっしゃい～、見てらっしゃい～、 珍しいモンも扱ってるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
寄ってらっしゃい～、見てらっしゃい～、
珍しいモンも扱ってるぜ！

engChrName: What about you, my fine, hard-working friend? This pristine orbal radio comes straight from the navy and it's a real bargain!
engSearchText:
What about you, my fine, hard-working friend?
This pristine orbal radio comes straight from the navy
and it's a real bargain!
jpnChrName: そこの船員の兄ちゃん、どうよ？ 海軍から流れた導力ラジオとかお勧めだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
そこの船員の兄ちゃん、どうよ？
海軍から流れた導力ラジオとかお勧めだぜ！

engChrName: Maybe people'd actually buy your junk if it didn't break after a couple of weeks.
engSearchText:
Maybe people'd actually buy your junk if it didn't
break after a couple of weeks.

jpnSearchText:
興味なくもねぇが、アンタんトコのモンだ、
どうせ一ヶ月も使わないうちに壊れちまうだろ。

engChrName: H-Hey, now. Sure, some of my customers have been unlucky, but it's not like ALL my wares go bad.

H-Hey, now. Sure, some of my customers have been
unlucky, but it's not like ALL my wares go bad.
jpnChrName: た、たまにはそういう 運が悪いこともあんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
た、たまにはそういう
運が悪いこともあんだろうが……

engChrName: I mean, c'mon! Just look at this thing—it's brand spanking new!
engSearchText:
I mean, c'mon! Just look at this thing—it's brand
spanking new!

jpnSearchText:
コイツは大丈夫だって！
ほら、ピカピカの新品同然だろ！？

engChrName: Forget it already. Besides, the wife'll have a conniption if I come home with your crap in hand.
engSearchText:
Forget it already. Besides, the wife'll have a
conniption if I come home with your crap in hand.
jpnChrName: やっぱやめとくわ、 ガラクタ買ったら女房に怒られるしな。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱやめとくわ、
ガラクタ買ったら女房に怒られるしな。

engChrName: Hold on! At least take a look at all these rare items—!
engSearchText: Hold on! At least take a look at all these rare items—!
jpnChrName: ってそんなこと言わずに！ 他にも色々と面白いモンが──
jpnSearchText:
ってそんなこと言わずに！
他にも色々と面白いモンが──

engChrName: Don't mind if I do.
engSearchText: Don't mind if I do.
jpnChrName: なら俺に紹介してくれよ。
jpnSearchText: なら俺に紹介してくれよ。

engChrName: Well, well! Finally a man with a discerning eye! What can I do for you today?
engSearchText:
Well, well! Finally a man with a discerning eye!
What can I do for you today?

おお兄ちゃん、見てく？
カワイコちゃんを連れてるが旅の者かい？

As it happens, I've been browsin' the stalls all over
town, but they're all just sellin' the same old stuff
you'd find anywhere.

jpnSearchText:
まあな──他の露店も見てみたが
どうも売ってるモンがありきたりでな。

I was hoping to find something a bit more special, if
you know what I mean.
jpnChrName: 面白い品がねぇか覗いてみたんだが。
jpnSearchText: 面白い品がねぇか覗いてみたんだが。

engChrName: Hoho! Then you've come to the right place, my friend!
engSearchText:
Hoho! Then you've come to the right place,
my friend!
jpnChrName: そいつはちょうどいい！
jpnSearchText: そいつはちょうどいい！

engChrName: My wares are the rarest of rare! You won't find variety like this anywhere else!
engSearchText:
My wares are the rarest of rare! You won't find variety
like this anywhere else!
jpnChrName: ウチが扱ってるのは曰く付きだったり 他とは一味違うと思うぜぇ？
jpnSearchText:
ウチが扱ってるのは曰く付きだったり
他とは一味違うと思うぜぇ？

engChrName: So, what sort of items are you interested in?
engSearchText: So, what sort of items are you interested in?
jpnChrName: ちなみにどういうのをお探しだい？
jpnSearchText: ちなみにどういうのをお探しだい？

engChrName: Seen anything that looks like this?
engSearchText: Seen anything that looks like this?
jpnChrName: これと似たモンを探してるんだが……
jpnSearchText: これと似たモンを探してるんだが……

jpnChrName: 仕事柄たまたまってだけだ。 最近妙に絡むことが多いんでな。
jpnSearchText:
仕事柄たまたまってだけだ。
最近妙に絡むことが多いんでな。

engChrName: Uh-huh...
engSearchText: Uh-huh...
jpnChrName: ハン……
jpnSearchText: ハン……

engChrName: All righty. Let's get back to the investigation.
engSearchText: All righty. Let's get back to the investigation.
jpnChrName: 調査の続きだ、ほら行くぞ。
jpnSearchText: 調査の続きだ、ほら行くぞ。

engChrName: I'm...surprised that you're already out and about. Shouldn't you be resting?
engSearchText:
I'm...surprised that you're already out and about.
Shouldn't you be resting?
jpnChrName: 貴方は……もう動いているのね。 結構重傷だったと思うのだけれど。
jpnSearchText:
貴方は……もう動いているのね。
結構重傷だったと思うのだけれど。

engChrName: Nah, I got myself a quick fix. It'll come back to bite me later, but I'll deal.
engSearchText:
Nah, I got myself a quick fix. It'll come back to bite
me later, but I'll deal.
jpnChrName: 利子が高くつく抜け道があったんでな。 こんな時に大人しく寝てなんてられっかよ。
jpnSearchText:
利子が高くつく抜け道があったんでな。
こんな時に大人しく寝てなんてられっかよ。

engChrName: So what's goin' on with you? Y'all wrap up your investigation?
engSearchText:
So what's goin' on with you? Y'all wrap up
your investigation?
jpnChrName: そっちはどうだ？ 内部の捜査は終わったみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
そっちはどうだ？
内部の捜査は終わったみたいだが。

engChrName: For the most part. We didn't get much out of it, unfortunately.
engSearchText:
For the most part. We didn't get much out of
it, unfortunately.
jpnChrName: ええ、一通りね。 収穫と言えるようなものはなかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、一通りね。
収穫と言えるようなものはなかったけど。

engChrName: Umm... Are the gangsters...?
engSearchText: Umm... Are the gangsters...?
jpnChrName: 中にいた半グレの人たちは……
jpnSearchText: 中にいた半グレの人たちは……

engChrName: They didn't make it.
engSearchText: They didn't make it.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら、全員息絶えている。
jpnSearchText: 残念ながら、全員息絶えている。

engChrName: That's five more lives claimed by Almata...
engSearchText: That's five more lives claimed by Almata...
jpnChrName: アルマータの幹部、大した徹底ぶりね……
jpnSearchText: アルマータの幹部、大した徹底ぶりね……

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: Like Giacomo, they chose to step into the darkness— and they got swallowed up by it.
engSearchText:
Like Giacomo, they chose to step into the darkness—
and they got swallowed up by it.
jpnChrName: ジャコモの時と同じく…… あいつらもある意味自業自得だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ジャコモの時と同じく……
あいつらもある意味自業自得だろう。

engChrName: That's just a natural consequence of followin' that path. No need for you two to feel responsible for what happened.
engSearchText:
That's just a natural consequence of followin'
that path. No need for you two to feel responsible for
what happened.
jpnChrName: 分不相応の“闇”に自分から踏み入った── お前らが気に病むことじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText:
分不相応の“闇”に自分から踏み入った──
お前らが気に病むことじゃねえ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: I know. I can't afford to dwell on this subject any more than I already have.
engSearchText:
I know. I can't afford to dwell on this subject any
more than I already have.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、分かっているわ。 まだ何も終わっていない以上捉われるわけにはいかない。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、分かっているわ。
まだ何も終わっていない以上捉われるわけにはいかない。

engChrName: There's something else that's been bothering me, though. The numbers just don't add up.
engSearchText:
There's something else that's been bothering
me, though. The numbers just don't add up.
jpnChrName: それより、ヴァン。 気付いてると思うけど、数が全然合わないわよ。
jpnSearchText:
それより、ヴァン。
気付いてると思うけど、数が全然合わないわよ。

engChrName: Yeah, I noticed that, too.
engSearchText: Yeah, I noticed that, too.
jpnChrName: やっぱりか、足りねえとは思ったが……
jpnSearchText: やっぱりか、足りねえとは思ったが……

engChrName: What are you two talking about?
engSearchText: What are you two talking about?
jpnChrName: 数、ですか？
jpnSearchText: 数、ですか？

engChrName: They must be referring to the total number of gangsters.
engSearchText:
They must be referring to the total number
of gangsters.
jpnChrName: ……半グレの人たちの、ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……半グレの人たちの、ですね。

engChrName: No way last night's murder spree was done by only five random thugs.
engSearchText:
No way last night's murder spree was done by only
five random thugs.
jpnChrName: ハン、あの場にいたクズどもだけじゃ 昨夜の規模の犯行はできねぇはずだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、あの場にいたクズどもだけじゃ
昨夜の規模の犯行はできねぇはずだからな。

engChrName: The storehouse is pretty big. Think some of 'em might've been hiding in there?
engSearchText:
The storehouse is pretty big. Think some of 'em
might've been hiding in there?
jpnChrName: かなり大きな倉庫だ。 半グレたちが隠れている可能性は？
jpnSearchText:
かなり大きな倉庫だ。
半グレたちが隠れている可能性は？

engChrName: Doubtful. We searched the place from top to bottom.
engSearchText: Doubtful. We searched the place from top to bottom.
jpnChrName: しらみつぶしに探したから、 それはないわ。
jpnSearchText:
しらみつぶしに探したから、
それはないわ。

engChrName: They must have another hideout, then.
engSearchText: They must have another hideout, then.
jpnChrName: チッ、やっぱ他に拠点があるってことか。
jpnSearchText: チッ、やっぱ他に拠点があるってことか。

engChrName: The guild and the police came to the same conclusion, but we have no idea where it might be.
engSearchText:
The guild and the police came to the same
conclusion, but we have no idea where it might be.
jpnChrName: ギルドも警察もそう踏んで捜査しているけど、 今の所手掛かりはないわね……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドも警察もそう踏んで捜査しているけど、
今の所手掛かりはないわね……

engChrName: We're in the same boat, then.
engSearchText: We're in the same boat, then.
jpnChrName: そっちもか……
jpnSearchText: そっちもか……

engChrName: Almata's managed to fly under Heiyue's all-seeing radar, so we don't know jack.
engSearchText:
Almata's managed to fly under Heiyue's all-seeing
radar, so we don't know jack.
jpnChrName: 黒月だけでもあり得ねえくらいだが、 ギルドも警察も手掛かりなし──
jpnSearchText:
黒月だけでもあり得ねえくらいだが、
ギルドも警察も手掛かりなし──

engChrName: It's almost like they vanished without a trace.
engSearchText: It's almost like they vanished without a trace.
jpnChrName: 厄介だなこりゃ。
jpnSearchText: 厄介だなこりゃ。

engChrName: I don't even know if most of Almata was actually here. We've only seen those two executives so far.
engSearchText:
I don't even know if most of Almata was
actually here. We've only seen those two executives
so far.
jpnChrName: それともう一つ、アルマータの 正規の構成員が見当たらないのも気になる。
jpnSearchText:
それともう一つ、アルマータの
正規の構成員が見当たらないのも気になる。

engChrName: If they really plan on going to war with Heiyue, they're going to need much more manpower than what they've shown.
engSearchText:
If they really plan on going to war with Heiyue,
they're going to need much more manpower than
what they've shown.
jpnChrName: 本気で黒月と戦争する気なら、 半グレたちだけでは話にならない。
jpnSearchText:
本気で黒月と戦争する気なら、
半グレたちだけでは話にならない。

engChrName: A handful of part-time gangsters won't cut it.
engSearchText: A handful of part-time gangsters won't cut it.
jpnChrName: にも拘らず、姿を現したのは 幹部とはいえ二人だけなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
にも拘らず、姿を現したのは
幹部とはいえ二人だけなんてね。

engChrName: Regardless, their lack of activity is certainly a cause for concern.
engSearchText:
Regardless, their lack of activity is certainly a cause
for concern.
jpnChrName: どこかに潜んでいるとしても、 ここまで動きがないのは不気味ですね……
jpnSearchText:
どこかに潜んでいるとしても、
ここまで動きがないのは不気味ですね……

engChrName: If the 'war on Heiyue' thing is just smoke-and-mirrors bullshit, then it'd all make sense.
engSearchText:
If the 'war on Heiyue' thing is just
smoke-and-mirrors bullshit, then it'd all make sense.
jpnChrName: 全面戦争なんて嘘っぱちで、正面から黒月と 事を構えるつもりはねえってんなら理屈は通るが。
jpnSearchText:
全面戦争なんて嘘っぱちで、正面から黒月と
事を構えるつもりはねえってんなら理屈は通るが。

engChrName: Perhaps they intend to send them on wild goose chases, chip away at their will to fight, then come in for the kill.
engSearchText:
Perhaps they intend to send them on wild goose
chases, chip away at their will to fight, then come in
for the kill.
jpnChrName: かき回すだけかき回して、黒月の気力を 削った上で本当の決戦の時期を別に用意する……
jpnSearchText:
かき回すだけかき回して、黒月の気力を
削った上で本当の決戦の時期を別に用意する……

engChrName: That sounds like something they'd do.
engSearchText: That sounds like something they'd do.
jpnChrName: あり得ない話じゃありませんね。
jpnSearchText: あり得ない話じゃありませんね。

engChrName: If my theory is correct, then I don't think Langport will see any more large-scale attacks from them.
engSearchText:
If my theory is correct, then I don't think Langport
will see any more large-scale attacks from them.
jpnChrName: それならそれで、せめて今すぐラングポートに大きな 被害が及ぶ可能性がない分マシかもしれないけど……
jpnSearchText:
それならそれで、せめて今すぐラングポートに大きな
被害が及ぶ可能性がない分マシかもしれないけど……

engChrName: Even if you're right, I still can't let things end like this.
engSearchText:
Even if you're right, I still can't let things end
like this.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それで終わらせてやるかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、それで終わらせてやるかよ。

engChrName: Those murdering bastards crossed the goddamn line—and I'll make sure they pay for it.
engSearchText:
Those murdering bastards crossed the goddamn
line—and I'll make sure they pay for it.
jpnChrName: ヤツらはとっくに“踏み越えた”── ケジメは絶対につけさせるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツらはとっくに“踏み越えた”──
ケジメは絶対につけさせるぜ。

engChrName: Aaron...
engSearchText: Aaron...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……

engChrName: Well, we can't do anything until we get more leads. I'm going to reach out to my contacts and see if they've found anything.
engSearchText:
Well, we can't do anything until we get more leads.
I'm going to reach out to my contacts and see if
they've found anything.
jpnChrName: いずれにしても、まだ調査は必要ね。 他の伝手を当たってみる。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにしても、まだ調査は必要ね。
他の伝手を当たってみる。

engChrName: I'm not going to tell you to stay out of this, but...try not to do anything crazy, okay?
engSearchText:
I'm not going to tell you to stay out of this, but...try
not to do anything crazy, okay?
jpnChrName: 貴方たちは……手を引かないつもりなら、 せめて無茶だけはしないように。
jpnSearchText:
貴方たちは……手を引かないつもりなら、
せめて無茶だけはしないように。

engChrName: Welp, guess we've hit a dead end.
engSearchText: Welp, guess we've hit a dead end.
jpnChrName: しかし、参ったな…… こっちも手掛かりなしか。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、参ったな……
こっちも手掛かりなしか。

engChrName: Elaine seems like she's at a loss as well.
engSearchText: Elaine seems like she's at a loss as well.
jpnChrName: エレインさんでも掴めていないなんて……
jpnSearchText: エレインさんでも掴めていないなんて……

engChrName: And she's no slouch when it comes to investigating.
engSearchText: And she's no slouch when it comes to investigating.
jpnChrName: あいつは噂通りっつーか、 噂以上に優秀な奴だ。
jpnSearchText:
あいつは噂通りっつーか、
噂以上に優秀な奴だ。

engChrName: So if even she's having trouble tracking them down...
engSearchText: So if even she's having trouble tracking them down...
jpnChrName: それでも拠点の場所が分からないってことは、 あいつや俺のような余所もんには──
jpnSearchText:
それでも拠点の場所が分からないってことは、
あいつや俺のような余所もんには──

engChrName: ...then I'd wager they're hiding in some place that outsiders like us wouldn't think of.
engSearchText:
...then I'd wager they're hiding in some place that
outsiders like us wouldn't think of.
jpnChrName: そもそも考えすら及ばないような 何かが関係してるのかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも考えすら及ばないような
何かが関係してるのかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Guess it's all up to me, then.
engSearchText: Guess it's all up to me, then.
jpnChrName: ハッ……暴いてやるさ、絶対に。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……暴いてやるさ、絶対に。

engChrName: You can count on me to carry the team.
engSearchText: You can count on me to carry the team.
jpnChrName: なんせピースを揃えられるのは 俺だけ、らしいからな？
jpnSearchText:
なんせピースを揃えられるのは
俺だけ、らしいからな？

engChrName: Good, 'cause this whole thing's riding on you now.
engSearchText: Good, 'cause this whole thing's riding on you now.
jpnChrName: ハッ、せいぜい期待させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、せいぜい期待させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Here's the goods.
engSearchText: Here's the goods.
jpnChrName: ……こちらになります。
jpnSearchText: ……こちらになります。

engChrName: Excellent work.
engSearchText: Excellent work.
jpnChrName: ああ、よくやった。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よくやった。

engChrName: The delivery person was switched out, yes?
engSearchText: The delivery person was switched out, yes?
jpnChrName: 指定した通り、 配達人は別の者をよこしていたか？
jpnSearchText:
指定した通り、
配達人は別の者をよこしていたか？

engChrName: Yeah. They got a kid to do the exchange.
engSearchText: Yeah. They got a kid to do the exchange.
jpnChrName: ええ、最初の男とは別の者…… それも子供が荷物を置きに来ました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、最初の男とは別の者……
それも子供が荷物を置きに来ました。

engChrName: Doesn't look like Heiyue's noticed a thing. I think we're in the clear.
engSearchText:
Doesn't look like Heiyue's noticed a thing. I think
we're in the clear.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》の方も感づいた様子はなく…… 問題ないと思います。
jpnSearchText:
《黒月》の方も感づいた様子はなく……
問題ないと思います。

engChrName: (So he's the guy who wanted the drugs.)
engSearchText: (So he's the guy who wanted the drugs.)
jpnChrName: （ハン……あいつが麻薬を欲しがってる   張本人って所かね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハン……あいつが麻薬を欲しがってる
張本人って所かね。）

engChrName: (He hasn't noticed us yet.)
engSearchText: (He hasn't noticed us yet.)
jpnChrName: （ひとまず私達の事は気付かれて   いないみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ひとまず私達の事は気付かれて
いないみたいですね。）

engChrName: (I think they're alone, too. Should we charge in?)
engSearchText: (I think they're alone, too. Should we charge in?)
jpnChrName: （他に潜伏している敵もいないみたいです。   ……突入しますか？）
jpnSearchText:
（他に潜伏している敵もいないみたいです。
……突入しますか？）

engChrName: (Yeah. Let's go!)
engSearchText: (Yeah. Let's go!)
jpnChrName: （ああ、行くぞ！）
jpnSearchText: （ああ、行くぞ！）

engChrName: Seize them.
engSearchText: Seize them.
jpnChrName: 制圧開始。
jpnSearchText: 制圧開始。

engChrName: Damn it! How'd they find us out?!
engSearchText: Damn it! How'd they find us out?!
jpnChrName: クソッ、どうしてここが分かった！？
jpnSearchText: クソッ、どうしてここが分かった！？

engChrName: You must've screwed up!
engSearchText: You must've screwed up!
jpnChrName: チッ……！　しくじりやがったな！？
jpnSearchText: チッ……！　しくじりやがったな！？

engChrName: Unhand me at once, you Heiyue scum!
engSearchText: Unhand me at once, you Heiyue scum!
jpnChrName: 離せ《黒月》どもがッ！ いつも邪魔しやがって目障りなッ！
jpnSearchText:
離せ《黒月》どもがッ！
いつも邪魔しやがって目障りなッ！

engChrName: Heiyue?!
engSearchText: Heiyue?!
jpnChrName: 貴方がたは、《黒月》の……！
jpnSearchText: 貴方がたは、《黒月》の……！

engChrName: Ugh. I didn't even realize they were behind us.
engSearchText: Ugh. I didn't even realize they were behind us.
jpnChrName: ううっ……気配に気付けませんでした。
jpnSearchText: ううっ……気配に気付けませんでした。

engChrName: Why do I feel like we were made into pawns?
engSearchText: Why do I feel like we were made into pawns?
jpnChrName: ハッ、俺達は良いように 転がされてたって訳か。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、俺達は良いように
転がされてたって訳か。

engChrName: Neil must've been the bait. I thought it was weird that he managed to give Heiyue the slip.
engSearchText:
Neil must've been the bait. I thought it was weird that
he managed to give Heiyue the slip.
jpnChrName: いや……あの依頼人（ニール）が 泳がされてたって方が正しいのかね。
jpnSearchText:
いや……あの依頼人（ニール）が
泳がされてたって方が正しいのかね。

engChrName: Well, either way, you're doin' us a solid here. Saves us the trouble of bringin' them in ourselves.
engSearchText:
Well, either way, you're doin' us a solid here. Saves us
the trouble of bringin' them in ourselves.
jpnChrName: ま、手間が省けて助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、手間が省けて助かったぜ。

engChrName: Heh. We're always happy to clean up the trash.
engSearchText: Heh. We're always happy to clean up the trash.
jpnChrName: ええ、あの男が《裏解決屋》に 依頼をしたのは好都合でした。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、あの男が《裏解決屋》に
依頼をしたのは好都合でした。

engChrName: Thank you for your assistance. We were lucky that he issued a request to you.
engSearchText:
Thank you for your assistance. We were lucky that he
issued a request to you.
jpnChrName: 面倒事に手間を取らせて申し訳ありませんでした。 後の事はこちらに任せて頂きたい。
jpnSearchText:
面倒事に手間を取らせて申し訳ありませんでした。
後の事はこちらに任せて頂きたい。

engChrName: Now, then. We will ask that you hand Neil over to us. He's a material witness and a suspect.
engSearchText:
Now, then. We will ask that you hand Neil over
to us. He's a material witness and a suspect.
jpnChrName: それでは、重要参考人であるあの男── ニールを引き渡してもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、重要参考人であるあの男──
ニールを引き渡してもらおうか。

engChrName: B-But he got caught up in all of this by accident.
engSearchText: B-But he got caught up in all of this by accident.
jpnChrName: あの人は何も知らずに 巻き込まれてしまっただけですよ？
jpnSearchText:
あの人は何も知らずに
巻き込まれてしまっただけですよ？

engChrName: Neil had no knowledge of the drugs. He doesn't deserve to be punished for this.
engSearchText:
Neil had no knowledge of the drugs. He doesn't
deserve to be punished for this.
jpnChrName: ラングポートに薬物を持ち込んだ責任が あるとはいえ、あまり厳しい事は……
jpnSearchText:
ラングポートに薬物を持ち込んだ責任が
あるとはいえ、あまり厳しい事は……

engChrName: That's for us to decide. Our job is to judge, yours is to comply.
engSearchText:
That's for us to decide. Our job is to judge, yours is
to comply.
jpnChrName: 情状酌量の余地があるとはいえ、 等しく裁かなければならない。
jpnSearchText:
情状酌量の余地があるとはいえ、
等しく裁かなければならない。

engChrName: I will ask one more time. Will you hand Neil over to us?
engSearchText:
I will ask one more time. Will you hand Neil over
to us?
jpnChrName: これは《黒月》の流儀だ。 余所者には黙って従ってもらおうか。
jpnSearchText:
これは《黒月》の流儀だ。
余所者には黙って従ってもらおうか。

engChrName: (The whole point of this request was to save our client. Giving him over to Heiyue would be like throwin' him to the wolves.)
engSearchText:
(The whole point of this request was to save
our client. Giving him over to Heiyue would be like
throwin' him to the wolves.)
jpnChrName: （依頼人を助けるってのが今回の依頼だ。   黒月に引き渡すのは論外だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（依頼人を助けるってのが今回の依頼だ。
黒月に引き渡すのは論外だな。）

engChrName: (The way I see it, we got two choices:)
engSearchText: (The way I see it, we got two choices:)
jpnChrName: （俺達の立場なら説得の余地もあるだろうが……）
jpnSearchText: （俺達の立場なら説得の余地もあるだろうが……）

engChrName: (We try to persuade 'em...)
engSearchText: (We try to persuade 'em...)
jpnChrName: （この手合いには“力”で示した方が   話が早いかもしれねえな。）
jpnSearchText:
（この手合いには“力”で示した方が
話が早いかもしれねえな。）

engChrName: (...or we fight.)
engSearchText: (...or we fight.)
jpnChrName: （その場合は、俺たちが負けちまう   リスクも負う訳だが……）
jpnSearchText:
（その場合は、俺たちが負けちまう
リスクも負う訳だが……）

engChrName: (Okay. Let's try that.)
engSearchText: (Okay. Let's try that.)
jpnChrName: （よし……これでいってみるか。）
jpnSearchText: （よし……これでいってみるか。）

engChrName: Sorry, but I don't think we have to comply.
engSearchText: Sorry, but I don't think we have to comply.
jpnChrName: 悪いが──俺達は白でも黒でもねえ《裏解決屋》だ。 仕事に関して、黒月の流儀に従うつもりはねえ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いが──俺達は白でも黒でもねえ《裏解決屋》だ。
仕事に関して、黒月の流儀に従うつもりはねえ。

engChrName: Our view is that our client shouldn't be judged for this.
engSearchText:
Our view is that our client shouldn't be judged
for this.
jpnChrName: 巻き込まれただけの依頼人が裁かれるのは 割に合わねえってのがこっちの見解だ。
jpnSearchText:
巻き込まれただけの依頼人が裁かれるのは
割に合わねえってのがこっちの見解だ。

engChrName: We are at an impasse, then.
engSearchText: We are at an impasse, then.
jpnChrName: フン……ならばどうするつもりだ。
jpnSearchText: フン……ならばどうするつもりだ。

engChrName: Yeah. So how about we compromise?
engSearchText: Yeah. So how about we compromise?
jpnChrName: ここは妥協案といかねえか？
jpnSearchText: ここは妥協案といかねえか？

engChrName: We ask that you don't lay a hand on our client.
engSearchText: We ask that you don't lay a hand on our client.
jpnChrName: こっちからの要求としては、 依頼主の身柄の安全だけは保証してもらう。
jpnSearchText:
こっちからの要求としては、
依頼主の身柄の安全だけは保証してもらう。

engChrName: You're a fool if you think we'd agree to that.
engSearchText: You're a fool if you think we'd agree to that.
jpnChrName: 虫が良すぎる提案だな。
jpnSearchText: 虫が良すぎる提案だな。

engChrName: Let me finish. In return, he'll be banned from Langport for a little while.
engSearchText:
Let me finish. In return, he'll be banned from
Langport for a little while.
jpnChrName: ああ、だからペナルティとして── ラングポートへの立ち入りを禁じるのはどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だからペナルティとして──
ラングポートへの立ち入りを禁じるのはどうだ？

engChrName: We'll let you decide how long the ban lasts. How's that sound?
engSearchText:
We'll let you decide how long the ban lasts.
How's that sound?
jpnChrName: 期間はそっちで決めてくれて構わねえ。 ……ここいらが落し所かと思うんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
期間はそっちで決めてくれて構わねえ。
……ここいらが落し所かと思うんだがな。

engChrName: Who do these outsiders think they are...?
engSearchText: Who do these outsiders think they are...?
jpnChrName: 余所者が何を言おうと言語道断。
jpnSearchText: 余所者が何を言おうと言語道断。

engChrName: *sigh* Very well. We can't deny your proposal—but only because you're the Lu family's honored guests.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Very well. We can't deny your proposal—but
only because you're the Lu family's honored guests.
jpnChrName: ……ですが皆様は他ならぬルウ家のお客人です。 耳を傾けぬ訳にもいきませんか。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが皆様は他ならぬルウ家のお客人です。
耳を傾けぬ訳にもいきませんか。

engChrName: Wait, really?!
engSearchText: Wait, really?!
jpnChrName: それなら……！
jpnSearchText: それなら……！

engChrName: Neil is barred from entering Langport for one year.
engSearchText: Neil is barred from entering Langport for one year.
jpnChrName: ニールには一年の間、 ラングポートへの立ち入りを禁じます。
jpnSearchText:
ニールには一年の間、
ラングポートへの立ち入りを禁じます。

engChrName: Should he breach this agreement, we WILL pass judgment on him.
engSearchText:
Should he breach this agreement, we WILL pass
judgment on him.
jpnChrName: その禁を破った場合のみ、 然るべき制裁を加えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
その禁を破った場合のみ、
然るべき制裁を加えましょう。

engChrName: Sounds good.
engSearchText: Sounds good.
jpnChrName: ああ、それで構わねえよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、それで構わねえよ。

engChrName: Phew. What a relief.
engSearchText: Phew. What a relief.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……これで丸く収まりそうですね。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……これで丸く収まりそうですね。

engChrName: I know you guys've got your own way of doin' things.
engSearchText: I know you guys've got your own way of doin' things.
jpnChrName: 《黒月》の流儀をとやかく言うつもりはねえよ。
jpnSearchText: 《黒月》の流儀をとやかく言うつもりはねえよ。

engChrName: But the same goes for us, too.
engSearchText: But the same goes for us, too.
jpnChrName: だが、こっちにも《裏解決屋》の 流儀ってもんがある。
jpnSearchText:
だが、こっちにも《裏解決屋》の
流儀ってもんがある。

engChrName: Saving Neil is our job, and we're not gonna compromise on that.
engSearchText:
Saving Neil is our job, and we're not gonna
compromise on that.
jpnChrName: アイツ（ニール）を助けるってのが今回の依頼だ。 悪いがタダで引き渡す事は出来ねえな。
jpnSearchText:
アイツ（ニール）を助けるってのが今回の依頼だ。
悪いがタダで引き渡す事は出来ねえな。

engChrName: How impertinent.
engSearchText: How impertinent.
jpnChrName: フン……生意気な事を。
jpnSearchText: フン……生意気な事を。

engChrName: That puts us at a standstill, though, so I've got an idea. Let's settle this with a good old-fashioned brawl.
engSearchText:
That puts us at a standstill, though, so I've got
an idea. Let's settle this with a good
old-fashioned brawl.
jpnChrName: そこで提案なんだが── どっちの流儀を通すか、勝負で決めねえか？
jpnSearchText:
そこで提案なんだが──
どっちの流儀を通すか、勝負で決めねえか？

engChrName: If we win, you'll have to keep your hands off our client. If you win, he's all yours.
engSearchText:
If we win, you'll have to keep your hands off
our client. If you win, he's all yours.
jpnChrName: 俺達が勝ったら依頼人の自由を保障してもらう。 お前さん達が勝ったら、引き渡してやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
俺達が勝ったら依頼人の自由を保障してもらう。
お前さん達が勝ったら、引き渡してやるよ。

engChrName: I can agree to that. It's your funeral, though.
engSearchText: I can agree to that. It's your funeral, though.
jpnChrName: 流石はルウ家のお客人、面白い提案ですね。
jpnSearchText: 流石はルウ家のお客人、面白い提案ですね。

engChrName: Let's change locations.
engSearchText: Let's change locations.
jpnChrName: いいでしょう── まずは場所を移しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
いいでしょう──
まずは場所を移しましょうか。

engChrName: Okay, it's just us now. No need to worry about locals getting in our way.
engSearchText:
Okay, it's just us now. No need to worry about locals
getting in our way.
jpnChrName: さて……この場ならば 市井に迷惑をかける事は無いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
さて……この場ならば
市井に迷惑をかける事は無いでしょう。

engChrName: Fair warning, spriggan: we aren't going to show you any mercy just because you have children with you.
engSearchText:
Fair warning, spriggan: we aren't going to show you
any mercy just because you have children with you.
jpnChrName: 女子供だからと手加減はせんぞ？ 全力でかかって来るといい。
jpnSearchText:
女子供だからと手加減はせんぞ？
全力でかかって来るといい。

engChrName: I thought as much.
engSearchText: I thought as much.
jpnChrName: はい、覚悟は出来ています。
jpnSearchText: はい、覚悟は出来ています。

engChrName: We have to win this, you guys!
engSearchText: We have to win this, you guys!
jpnChrName: ニールさんの為にも負けられませんね……！
jpnSearchText: ニールさんの為にも負けられませんね……！

engChrName: Right. For Neil!
engSearchText: Right. For Neil!
jpnChrName: わたしも準備万端ですっ！ いつでもいけますよ！
jpnSearchText:
わたしも準備万端ですっ！
いつでもいけますよ！

engChrName: All right. Let's show 'em how it's done!
engSearchText: All right. Let's show 'em how it's done!
jpnChrName: おう、それじゃ行くぞ。 《裏解決屋》の流儀、押し通させてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
おう、それじゃ行くぞ。
《裏解決屋》の流儀、押し通させてもらうぜ！

engChrName: Ugh... They're...too strong.
engSearchText: Ugh... They're...too strong.
jpnChrName: くっ……成程。 これが《裏解決屋》の実力ですか。
jpnSearchText:
くっ……成程。
これが《裏解決屋》の実力ですか。

engChrName: No wonder the Lu family and Master Cao place so much faith in you.
engSearchText:
No wonder the Lu family and Master Cao place so
much faith in you.
jpnChrName: ルウ家の方々やツァオ様が 信頼を置くのも頷ける……
jpnSearchText:
ルウ家の方々やツァオ様が
信頼を置くのも頷ける……

engChrName: Phew. That just about wraps things up.
engSearchText: Phew. That just about wraps things up.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、まぁこんな所か。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、まぁこんな所か。

engChrName: If there's one thing I've learned from this, it's that the Gekka style is terrifying!
engSearchText:
If there's one thing I've learned from this, it's that the
Gekka style is terrifying!
jpnChrName: 《月華流》の拳法、 敵に回すと手強いですね……
jpnSearchText:
《月華流》の拳法、
敵に回すと手強いですね……

engChrName: No kidding.
engSearchText: No kidding.
jpnChrName: 二人について行くので精一杯でしたけど、 なんとか勝てて良かったです……！
jpnSearchText:
二人について行くので精一杯でしたけど、
なんとか勝てて良かったです……！

engChrName: Well, you've bested us.
engSearchText: Well, you've bested us.
jpnChrName: ……《裏解決屋》の覚悟と流儀、 しかと見極めさせて頂きました。
jpnSearchText:
……《裏解決屋》の覚悟と流儀、
しかと見極めさせて頂きました。

engChrName: As per our agreement, we won't apprehend Neil.
engSearchText: As per our agreement, we won't apprehend Neil.
jpnChrName: 重要参考人（ニール）は今回不問とし、 確保は諦めるとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
重要参考人（ニール）は今回不問とし、
確保は諦めるとしましょう。

engChrName: Tell him to be more careful when taking jobs that seem too good to be true.
engSearchText:
Tell him to be more careful when taking jobs that
seem too good to be true.
jpnChrName: 今後は利用されぬよう 注意しろと伝えておけ。
jpnSearchText:
今後は利用されぬよう
注意しろと伝えておけ。

engChrName: We will! Thank you very much!
engSearchText: We will! Thank you very much!
jpnChrName: はい、ありがとうございます……！
jpnSearchText: はい、ありがとうございます……！

engChrName: Well, then. I think it's about time we go back and deliver the good news.
engSearchText:
Well, then. I think it's about time we go back and
deliver the good news.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… それじゃ俺達は失礼させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
それじゃ俺達は失礼させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Thanks for sparring with us! It was a ton of fun!
engSearchText: Thanks for sparring with us! It was a ton of fun!
jpnChrName: 手合わせ、ありがとうございましたっ！
jpnSearchText: 手合わせ、ありがとうございましたっ！

engChrName: Did you seriously follow us all the way out here?!
engSearchText: Did you seriously follow us all the way out here?!
jpnChrName: しつこい奴らめ！ こうなれば徹底的にやるしかないか。
jpnSearchText:
しつこい奴らめ！
こうなれば徹底的にやるしかないか。

engChrName: Bad move. You just signed your own death warrants!
engSearchText: Bad move. You just signed your own death warrants!
jpnChrName: ああ、目にもの見せてくれる！
jpnSearchText: ああ、目にもの見せてくれる！

engChrName: P-Please, just let us go!
engSearchText: P-Please, just let us go!
jpnChrName: み、見逃してくれ……
jpnSearchText: み、見逃してくれ……

engChrName: We don't have any money. The mafia took every last mira we saved up.
engSearchText:
We don't have any money. The mafia took every last
mira we saved up.
jpnChrName: そもそも俺たちが稼いだ金は…… ほとんどマフィアに持っていかれたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも俺たちが稼いだ金は……
ほとんどマフィアに持っていかれたんだ。

engChrName: Almata beat you guys to the punch there.
engSearchText: Almata beat you guys to the punch there.
jpnChrName: ああ、だから俺たちを 締め上げた所でミラは手に入らない。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だから俺たちを
締め上げた所でミラは手に入らない。

engChrName: Well, lucky for you, we don't care about the money.
engSearchText: Well, lucky for you, we don't care about the money.
jpnChrName: フンッ、金の問題じゃねえんだよ。
jpnSearchText: フンッ、金の問題じゃねえんだよ。

engChrName: Fess up. You've been handing the people you beat to the mafia, right?
engSearchText:
Fess up. You've been handing the people you beat to
the mafia, right?
jpnChrName: てめえらはギャンブルに負けた人間を マフィアに引き渡した……
jpnSearchText:
てめえらはギャンブルに負けた人間を
マフィアに引き渡した……

engChrName: Well?
engSearchText: Well?
jpnChrName: そうなんだろ？
jpnSearchText: そうなんだろ？

engChrName: W-We were just following orders.
engSearchText: W-We were just following orders.
jpnChrName: そ、それもあくまでも 上の人間に従ったまでで……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それもあくまでも
上の人間に従ったまでで……

engChrName: Yeah! We had no choice. It was us or them!
engSearchText: Yeah! We had no choice. It was us or them!
jpnChrName: そうだ……別に 俺たちが決めたことじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
そうだ……別に
俺たちが決めたことじゃない。

engChrName: I don't wanna hear your pathetic excuses!
engSearchText: I don't wanna hear your pathetic excuses!
jpnChrName: てめえら……！
jpnSearchText: てめえら……！

engChrName: Save your breath.
engSearchText: Save your breath.
jpnChrName: こいつらには何を言っても無駄だろう。
jpnSearchText: こいつらには何を言っても無駄だろう。

engChrName: At this point, we should just give them over to the right people.
engSearchText:
At this point, we should just give them over to the
right people.
jpnChrName: だったら俺たちにできるのは 引き渡すべき所に引き渡すことだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
だったら俺たちにできるのは
引き渡すべき所に引き渡すことだけだ。

engChrName: No point gettin' rough with them. They ain't worth it.
engSearchText:
No point gettin' rough with them. They ain't
worth it.
jpnChrName: こんなクズ共のために 何もお前が拳を痛める必要はねえ。
jpnSearchText:
こんなクズ共のために
何もお前が拳を痛める必要はねえ。

engChrName: You can't be serious.
engSearchText: You can't be serious.
jpnChrName: はっきり言って甘えな……アンタ。
jpnSearchText: はっきり言って甘えな……アンタ。

engChrName: *sigh* Fine. I guess you're right.
engSearchText: *sigh* Fine. I guess you're right.
jpnChrName: だがまあ……言ってることは分かる。
jpnSearchText: だがまあ……言ってることは分かる。

engChrName: So, who are you handing them over to?
engSearchText: So, who are you handing them over to?
jpnChrName: で、こいつらは 一体どこに突き出すつもりなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
で、こいつらは
一体どこに突き出すつもりなんだ。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: If we wanna get justice for the people who've been hurt by 'em...
engSearchText:
If we wanna get justice for the people who've been
hurt by 'em...
jpnChrName: 被害に遭った人間を 少しでも何とかしたいなら……
jpnSearchText:
被害に遭った人間を
少しでも何とかしたいなら……

engChrName: ...then handing them over to the guild is the right call.
engSearchText:
...then handing them over to the guild is the
right call.
jpnChrName: ギルドに引き渡すのが一番だろうな。
jpnSearchText: ギルドに引き渡すのが一番だろうな。

engChrName: You think so? I dunno. Those guys are way too soft.
engSearchText: You think so? I dunno. Those guys are way too soft.
jpnChrName: ギルドか…… 正直、一番手ぬるい気はするが。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドか……
正直、一番手ぬるい気はするが。

engChrName: Look at it from this perspective.
engSearchText: Look at it from this perspective.
jpnChrName: それも考え方次第だ。
jpnSearchText: それも考え方次第だ。

engChrName: The guild's got branches all over the continent, and its info network isn't anything to sneeze at.
engSearchText:
The guild's got branches all over the continent, and
its info network isn't anything to sneeze at.
jpnChrName: ギルドは何といっても 大陸中に根を張る国際的な組織だからな。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドは何といっても
大陸中に根を張る国際的な組織だからな。

engChrName: If they tried to flee the country, the bracers would be on 'em in seconds flat.
engSearchText:
If they tried to flee the country, the bracers would be
on 'em in seconds flat.
jpnChrName: 仮にこいつらが国外に逃げたとしても そのマークから逃れることは難しいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
仮にこいつらが国外に逃げたとしても
そのマークから逃れることは難しいだろう。

engChrName: Fair point.
engSearchText: Fair point.
jpnChrName: フン、確かにそれもそうか。
jpnSearchText: フン、確かにそれもそうか。

engChrName: All right, then. Let's call up the guild.
engSearchText: All right, then. Let's call up the guild.
jpnChrName: そうと決まればさっさと連絡しようぜ。
jpnSearchText: そうと決まればさっさと連絡しようぜ。

engChrName: On it.
engSearchText: On it.
jpnChrName: ああ、任せろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、任せろ。

engChrName: Van contacted the guild and gave Samson and Richie over to them.
engSearchText:
Van contacted the guild and gave Samson and Richie
over to them.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはギルドに連絡を入れ、 サンソンとリッチーの身柄を引き渡した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはギルドに連絡を入れ、
サンソンとリッチーの身柄を引き渡した。

engChrName: I think the cops are probably the best choice.
engSearchText: I think the cops are probably the best choice.
jpnChrName: ま、順当に考えれば 警察に引き渡すのが一番だろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、順当に考えれば
警察に引き渡すのが一番だろうな。

engChrName: You really think so?
engSearchText: You really think so?
jpnChrName: 警察か……多少ぬるい気もするが。
jpnSearchText: 警察か……多少ぬるい気もするが。

engChrName: I guess it'd be nice for them to be judged by the law.
engSearchText: I guess it'd be nice for them to be judged by the law.
jpnChrName: 法の下できっちり裁かれることだけは 間違いないだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
法の下できっちり裁かれることだけは
間違いないだろうからな。

engChrName: Yeah, but that's not all.
engSearchText: Yeah, but that's not all.
jpnChrName: ああ、だが実はそれだけじゃない。
jpnSearchText: ああ、だが実はそれだけじゃない。

engChrName: Unlike the guild, the police aren't merciful.
engSearchText: Unlike the guild, the police aren't merciful.
jpnChrName: 警察はギルドとは違って、 ドライな所はドライだからな。
jpnSearchText:
警察はギルドとは違って、
ドライな所はドライだからな。

engChrName: Once they've done their time, the police have no obligation to protect 'em.
engSearchText:
Once they've done their time, the police have no
obligation to protect 'em.
jpnChrName: こいつらが相応の刑罰を受けた後は その身を保障する義理は一切なくなる。
jpnSearchText:
こいつらが相応の刑罰を受けた後は
その身を保障する義理は一切なくなる。

engChrName: And that means Almata might swoop in and make 'em disappear.
engSearchText:
And that means Almata might swoop in and make
'em disappear.
jpnChrName: そうなりゃあ、《Ａ》から粛清される 可能性も十分にあり得るってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうなりゃあ、《Ａ》から粛清される
可能性も十分にあり得るってわけだ。

engChrName: Oho. You've got a point there.
engSearchText: Oho. You've got a point there.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……
jpnSearchText: なるほどな……

engChrName: Damn, though. That's pretty coldhearted.
engSearchText: Damn, though. That's pretty coldhearted.
jpnChrName: オッサンのことを 甘いと言ったのは取り消すぜ。
jpnSearchText:
オッサンのことを
甘いと言ったのは取り消すぜ。

engChrName: And here I thought you were just a big ol' softie.
engSearchText: And here I thought you were just a big ol' softie.
jpnChrName: なかなかいい感じで冷酷じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: なかなかいい感じで冷酷じゃねえか。

engChrName: You'll find that I'm a pretty complicated guy.
engSearchText: You'll find that I'm a pretty complicated guy.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言ってろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、言ってろ。

engChrName: Anyway, I'm gonna go ahead and call up the cops.
engSearchText: Anyway, I'm gonna go ahead and call up the cops.
jpnChrName: とにかく、さっさと通報して終わらせるぞ。
jpnSearchText: とにかく、さっさと通報して終わらせるぞ。

engChrName: Van contacted the police and gave Samson and Richie over to them.
engSearchText:
Van contacted the police and gave Samson and
Richie over to them.
jpnChrName: ヴァンは警察に連絡を入れ、 サンソンとリッチーの身柄を引き渡した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンは警察に連絡を入れ、
サンソンとリッチーの身柄を引き渡した。

engChrName: Well, if we really want 'em to pay for what they've done...
engSearchText:
Well, if we really want 'em to pay for what
they've done...
jpnChrName: そうだな、こいつらに最も 痛い目に遭ってもらうってんなら……
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、こいつらに最も
痛い目に遭ってもらうってんなら……

engChrName: ...then Heiyue's our best option.
engSearchText: ...then Heiyue's our best option.
jpnChrName: 黒月に引き渡すのが一番かもな。
jpnSearchText: 黒月に引き渡すのが一番かもな。

engChrName: Yeah. They won't show them any mercy.
engSearchText: Yeah. They won't show them any mercy.
jpnChrName: ハッ、確かに違いねえ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、確かに違いねえ。

engChrName: Especially since Easterners were among their victims.
engSearchText: Especially since Easterners were among their victims.
jpnChrName: 被害に遭った人間の中には 東方系の奴らもいただろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
被害に遭った人間の中には
東方系の奴らもいただろうからな。

engChrName: The severity of the punishment might change depending on how many of them were caught up in their scheme.
engSearchText:
The severity of the punishment might change
depending on how many of them were caught up in
their scheme.
jpnChrName: その数次第で こいつらの処遇も変わりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
その数次第で
こいつらの処遇も変わりそうだ。

engChrName: Either way, they'll be punished a hell of a lot more harshly than if we gave them over to the guild or the cops.
engSearchText:
Either way, they'll be punished a hell of a lot more
harshly than if we gave them over to the guild or
the cops.
jpnChrName: いずれにしても、警察やギルド以上の ペナルティは想定される。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにしても、警察やギルド以上の
ペナルティは想定される。

engChrName: That good with you?
engSearchText: That good with you?
jpnChrName: 今回はそういう落としどころでどうだ。
jpnSearchText: 今回はそういう落としどころでどうだ。

engChrName: You aren't gonna hear any objections from me.
engSearchText: You aren't gonna hear any objections from me.
jpnChrName: 異存はねえ。
jpnSearchText: 異存はねえ。

engChrName: Wanna go ahead and get in touch with them?
engSearchText: Wanna go ahead and get in touch with them?
jpnChrName: そうと決まりゃあ、すぐにでも 連絡を入れて連れて行ってもらおうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そうと決まりゃあ、すぐにでも
連絡を入れて連れて行ってもらおうぜ。

engChrName: Yeah. The Kowloon Hotel receptionist can help us there.
engSearchText:
Yeah. The Kowloon Hotel receptionist can help
us there.
jpnChrName: ああ、なら九龍ホテルの受付嬢に 連絡を入れて引き取ってもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、なら九龍ホテルの受付嬢に
連絡を入れて引き取ってもらうか。
